summary: MANORIAN SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS
body:
MANORIAN SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS

I love how Manon was the one who “slept on the couch” anytime her and Dorian got into an argument. Like it was clearly her tent. She could have kicked him out.

summary: "She was stunning, long and lean, each of her features perfectly formed and smooth. Her loose white dress contrasted with her...
body:
“She was stunning, long and lean, each of her features perfectly formed and smooth. Her loose white dress contrasted with her creamy brown skin, and a three-plated gold torque covered much of her chest and neck.” 🌟👑🌟

Princess Nehemia cosplay made by me. My design was inspired by a lot of the beautiful Nehemia art that’s out there and I love and appreciate all the tog artists so much!!💛💛💛

📸 by @midsummersdream10 😗💕

Thank you @sjmaas for the beautiful world and characters of Throne of Glass. 🔥👑🔥

Please do NOT repost my cosplays, thank you so much!

You can find more of my work on Instagram @ Feelsbender!! 😀😄💕

summary: Remember that we have something to fight for, and it will always triumph.
text: Remember that we have something to fight for, and it will always triumph.
source: Sarah J. Maas, Kingdom of Ash

reblog.comment: Sarah J. Maas, Kingdom of Ash

summary: Kingdom of Ash
body:
Kingdom of Ash

I cried when Aelin and Fenrys hugged. I hadn’t cried a single tear till that moment, not even at “take it off”, but when Aelin shut everybody out but hugged Fenrys i cried. They had both endured so much bad came out so broken, but they stuck together. This was pure friendship!!

reblog.comment:
Kingdom of Ash

summary: Kingdom of Ash event
body:
Kingdom of Ash event

Okay so I went to the Kingdom of Ash event in London, even though I don’t live in England. I’m on an exchange there (the reason it took me so long to read KoA) and my first thought when I heard I would go to England was that I could come to the event!

So I went there with a friend and I loved it! Before we got in everybody had to grab a piece of paper with a number on it for the end, when they would announce which fifty people would actually meet Sarah. I picked a yellow card with the number 13. In the whole bag there was only one yellow one, surrounded by blue and green. I grabbed it out of instinct.

At the end of the event, the presentation just said everybody with a yellow card could meet her! I don’t think I’ve ever been so dumdfounded.

When waiting to meet Sarah I was totally shaking and looking like a tomato. I think I just died and went to heaven at that moment, cause no way I have that much luck. When it was my turn I expected from myself not to be a blue to say one thing, but I actually formed two coherent sentences. “I love your books so much!” And “Azriel is my favourite character, I love him!” She said she thought Az was quiet but sexy and I couldn’t agree more.

The whole experience was great! And if you ever get the chance, I highly recommend going to those events!

reblog.comment:

summary: Book Review: Catwoman: Soulstealer by Sarah J. Maas
title: Book Review: Catwoman: Soulstealer by Sarah J. Maas
body:
Title: Catwoman: Soul Stealer by Sarah J. Maas

My Rating: 4 Stars

Publisher: Penguin

Source: Times Reads

Goodreads Synopsis:

When the Bat’s away, the Cat will play. It’s time to see how many lives this cat really has… .

Two years after escaping Gotham City’s slums, Selina Kyle returns as the mysterious and wealthy Holly Vanderhees. She quickly discovers that with Batman off on a vital…

summary: Cat-woman was a good way to describe her. The ears on the dark helmet, the oversized lenses, the claws that she’d just retracted...
text: Cat-woman was a good way to describe her. The ears on the dark helmet, the oversized lenses, the claws that she’d just retracted after that spectacular jump… Even her steps toward him oozed feline grace.
source: Sarah J. Maas, Catwoman: Soulstealer

blog.name: ultimatebookworm13
blog.title: Musings
blog.description: Ask me anything. Ask me for book recommendations at your own risk, you might just get a list of 100+ books. Some favored authors are as follows: Tamora Pierce, Christine Feehan, John Flanagan, Alexandra Ivy, Kristin Cashore,....that's all I can think of off the top of my head, but there are more. I am a fan of One Piece, Supernatural, the Lizzie Bennet Diaries, Sailor Moon, Dragon Ball Z, Pokemon, among other things. Generally i just post shit that i like.

summary:
I’ve been begging my mom to read Throne of Glass for YEARS!! I finally got her to read them 💃🏼💃🏼💃🏼
She loves them (of course)....
body:
Victory!!!!

I’ve been begging my mom to read Throne of Glass for YEARS!! I finally got her to read them 💃🏼💃🏼💃🏼

She loves them (of course).

She’s just started Empire of Storms and told me that she couldn’t handle the end of Queen of Shadows.

summary: ACOTAR Characters As Text Post Part 2
body:
ACOTAR Characters As Text Post Part 2

Rhysand: Sometimes “brb” stands for “Be Ready Bitch” so you have to be careful

Feyre: Becoming a cold hearted bitch really wasn’t what I planned to do with my life but here we are

Cassian: No mom I already have a job it’s called being hardcore

Mor: The Bible says Adam and Eve so I did both

Azriel: I used too much No Tear shampoo and I haven’t felt a single emotion since

Amren: I might seem like an angry person on the surface but deep down I’m actually angrier

Nesta: I don’t want to look “pretty” I want to look otherworldly and vaguely threatening

Elain: I’m tired of life I want to be a flower

Lucien: That awkward moment between birth and death

Tamlin: I’m not even sassy I’m just an asshole
